text: title: Hello WorldWelcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-string">"My New Post"</span> `</pre> More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html) ### Run server <pre>`$ hexo <span class="hljs-keyword">server</span> `</pre> More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html) ### Generate static files <pre>`<span class="hljs-variable">$ </span>hexo generate `</pre> More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html) ### Deploy to remote sites <pre>`<span class="hljs-variable">$ </span>hexo deploy More info: Deployment
